resources.name: /comparisons
resources.description:
# GET /comparisons
- returns paginated(10) collection of comparisons

# Query params
- none

# Example:
- /comparisons - returns all comparisons

# Query params
- none

## Response example:
```
{
  "data": [
	    {
			"id": 45,
			"string1": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet fatback kielbasa pork irure non.",
			"string2": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet tongue velit capicola sed nisi ea.",
			"matching_chars": 34,
			"match_percentage": 60.71
		},
		{
			"id": 44,
			"string1": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet consequat minim quis, ex nisi exercitation culpa burgdoggen enim in deserunt landjaeger.",
			"string2": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet sirloin shank pork belly, ground round burgdoggen consectetur cupim aliquip chicken occaecat dolore tempor.",
			"matching_chars": 59,
			"match_percentage": 48.96
		},
		{
			"id": 43,
			"string1": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet lorem aliqua aliquip ut venison tail ground round t-bone.",
			"string2": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet sausage ea sint salami pancetta.",
			"matching_chars": 33,
			"match_percentage": 48.89
		},
    c4,
    c5,
    ...
	]
}
```

resources.name: /comparisons/similar-text
resources.description:
# GET /comparisons/similar-text
- fetch two strings from https://baconipsum.com/ and calculate similarity between them using PHP similar_text()
- returns two fetched strings and their similarity results with both number of matching characters and similarity percentage
- optional persisting to database, use boolean "persist-to-db" query parameter

# Examples:
- /comparisons/similar-text?persist-to-db=1 - will fetch two strings, save comparison result to database and return JSON result
- /comparisons/similar-text?persist-to-db=0 - will fetch two strings and return JSON result
- /comparisons/similar-text - will fetch two strings and return JSON result

# Query params
- persist-to-db => ['nullable', 'boolean'],

### Param "persist-to-db" accepts bool values
- 1 - save comparison result to database
- 0 - don't save comparison result to database

## Response example:
```
{
    "data": {
        "bacon_string_1": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet nostrud drumstick nisi pork belly excepteur, dolore capicola veniam.",
        "bacon_string_2": "Bacon ipsum dolor amet bresaola frankfurter pig adipisicing enim.",
        "matching_chars": 36,
        "percentage": 46.15,
        "saved_result_to_db": true
    }
}
```
